&7This is an alternative route to going full protection, and instead focusing on sustaining yourself using the Tome of Vampiric Knowledge.
&7For artifact choice, you have &6Fury of a Thousand Fists&7 for monk builds, or &6Ash'edar&7 for swordman builds. A dagger artifact is coming in the future.
&eArtifact Option: &6Fury of a Thousand Fists &e(Monk's Way)
&eTitan's Shroud &7is your preferred armor because it has the highest &6Physical Damage &7stat, which is your main priority.
&7For an artifact choice, &6Thunderwrath&7 is the best as it interacts directly with the &9Warrior's Devotion&7 fate.
&7You can also make &eHero's Armor&7 as an alternative, as it provides &eLightning Power&7, which depending on your Thunderwrath upgrade it could be useful to you.
&eEnough Knowledge to understand all Tier IV Builds. Good job.
&eHint:&7 You masterized the builds, but what about your artifacts? Try doing some Mythical Challenges with them.
ftbquests.chapter.elhasturian_era.title: &e&lHasturian Era
ftbquests.chapter.elhasturian_era.quests: &cFinish all chapters of Void's Invasion to unlock this expansion's story line.
&cTermina todos los capitulos de Void's Invasion para desbloquear la campaa de esta expansin.
&7&oEons ago, S'kellak fought against the eldritch beings, defeating and imprisoning the primordial being C'thulhu.

&7&oWhile its followers escaped, the chains imprisoning its half-brother, a tall hooded monster with tentacles, were broken free. S'kellak couldn't stop his escape, and for eons he never saw him again.
&7&oUntil now, after the attempt at domination from the remaining forces of the void, all realms lie the weakest they've been.
&e&oThe King in Yellow is back, and won't stop until all realms succumb to his new reign.
&7&oHace eones, S'kellak luch contra los seres ancestrales, derrotando y encarcelando al ser primordial C'thulhu.

&7&oMientras sus seguidores escapaban, las cadenas que aprisionaban a su medio hermano, un monstruo alto encapuchado con tentculos, se rompieron. S'kellak no pudo detener su escape, y durante eones no lo volvi a ver.
&7&oHasta que despus del intento de dominacin de las fuerzas restantes del vaco, todos los reinos se hallan en su punto ms dbil.
&e&oEl Rey de Amarillo ha vuelto, y no se detendr hasta que todos los reinos sucumban a su nuevo reinado.
&7&oI have confirmed that it's him, the primordial being of all unholy things, known as Hastur.
&7&oThe Overworld is not safe, Hastur is great at twisting the minds of others, I will need you to come to Vaaz as soon as you can, before one of his twisted slaves come after you.
&7&oUse this beacon in the overworld, and I'll bring you to Vaaz.
&7&oAlso enchant your weapon with Smite, Hastur's followers are undead. You should be prepared for the worst."
&7&oHe confirmado que es l, el ser primordial de todas las cosas profanas, conocido como Hastur.

&7&oEl Overworld no est a salvo, Hastur es experto en retorcer las mentes de los seres. Necesito que vengas a Vaaz tan pronto como puedas, antes de que uno de sus esclavos retorcidos venga tras de ti.
&7&oUsa este faro en el Overworld, y te traer a Vaaz.
&7&oTambin encanta tu arma con Castigo, los seguidores de Hastur son no-muertos. Debes estar preparado para lo peor."
&7The once archmage and leader of the Hex, dead in the hands of the Champions of Vaaz, was been resurrected by Hastur himself.
&7Now part of the cult and infused with Hastur's power, he has been chosen to sabotage the plans of S'kellak. Kidnapping and killing anyone who tries to travel to the Cinderstone Depths.
&eUse Smite to shred his barrier if you don't have the required spell power!
&7El pasado archimago y lder de los Hex, muerto a manos de los Campeones de Vaaz, ha sido resucitado por el mismsimo Hastur.

&7Ahora, como parte del culto e infundido con el poder de Hastur, ha sido elegido para sabotear los planes de S'kellak. Secuestrando y matando a cualquiera que intente viajar a las Profundidades de Piedraceniza.
&eUsa Castigo para romper su barrera si no tienes el poder de hechizo requerido!
&7Signal this beacon in the overworld to travel to Vaaz and meet S'kellak.
&7Llama este faro en el Overworld para viajar a Vaaz y encontrarte con S'kellak.
&eUse the Beacon of Hope and Travel to Vaaz
&7&oCorruption Infusions can be used to add corruption to Armor Pieces, which are useful for corruption scaled abilities.
&7&oActive Abilities from the Talent Tree have special effects and scaling with Corruption.
&7The Corruption Infusion Template can be found as loot in end cities.
&eUse in a Smithing Table along with the desired item and a material.
&7&oLas Infusiones de Corrupcin pueden ser usadas para aadir corrupcin a piezas de Armadura, lo cual es til para habilidades que escalan con la corrupcin.
&7&oLas Habilidades Activas del rbol de Talentos tienen efectos especiales y escalan con la Corrupcin.
&7El Molde de Infusin de Corrupcin se puede encontrar como botn en las ciudades del End.
&eUsa en una Mesa de Herrera junto con el arma o armadura, y un material.
&7&oEtyr Infusions can be used to add Corruption Resistance to armor pieces, that counteract with your amount of corruption.
&7&oWhile abilities scale with Corruption, negative effects are based on your &nTotal Corruption&r&7&o, which accounts for your Etyr.
&7The Etyr Infusion Template can be found as loot in end cities.
&eUse in a Smithing Table along with the desired item and a material.
&7&oLas Infusiones de Etyr pueden ser usadas para aadir Resistencia a la Corrupcin a las piezas de armadura, contrarrestando tu cantidad de corrupcin.
&7&oMientras que las habilidades escalan con la Corrupcin, los efectos negativos se basan en tu &nCorrupcin Total&r&7&o, que tiene en cuenta tu Etyr.
&7El Molde de Infusin de Etyr se puede encontrar como botn en las ciudades del End.
&eUsa en una Mesa de Herrera junto con la armadura y un material.
&7The Beacon of Hope is broken, now, with no way to communicate with S'kellak, you will need to find a way to travel to Vaaz by yourself.
&eThis questline is coming on v3.2.0, along with the Cinderstone Depths dimension and the capital city of Vaaz!
ftbquests.chapter.e_spell_books.title: &e Unlocking Abilities
&eThe Spell Binding Table is the source of creation of Tier I spellbooks. It also allows you to attach spells to all spellbooks, regardless of their tier.
&7To maximize its performance and allow it to unlock all spells, you must surround it with &eBookshelves&7 similarly to an Enchanting Table.
&eBefore delving into creating your first spellbook, you might want to ask, what do tiers mean?
&8The difficulty next to them defines the complexity of each book, how hard it is to master them.
&eTier I: &7Base class books that can be obtained through the Spell Binding Table.
&6Tier II: &7Hybrid class books that require a crafting recipe using a Tier I book to be obtained.
&cTier III: &7Advanced class books that expand / evolve Tier II books, or have an advanced gameplay. They require a Cinderstone Trophy to be made.
&7A higher tier book &cdoes not mean it is stronger&7, rather that it is obtained in a different way.
&7A basic book for bruisers or protectors. A great middle ground for slower Physical Damage builds.
&7A spellbook that focuses on providing utilities for rogue builds, from stacking damage increases to teleports, stuns and quick stealth.
&7The basic spell book for Archers. Focuses on improving the archery gameplay with extra abilities. From a passive improvement of your shots, to crowd control and a rapidfire of arrows.
&7Channel the primordial Holy powers to heal your allies.
&7A ranged casting spell book that uses Arcane magic to deal very powerful attacks with high critical damage.
&7A ranged casting spell book that uses Frost magic to deal constant and quick damage with utilities such as crowd control and defensive spells.
&7A ranged casting spell book that uses Fire magic to deal strong attacks with a high critical chance.
&7A combination of a Warrior and a Priest, a protector that summons the Holy to protect their allies.
&7There are three types of Death Knights
&7Focused towards dealing damage to multiple targets, easy to understand but the hardest of all three to masterize.
&7Focused on dealing high damage to a single target, especially good with the Decaying Devotion fate talent.
&7Focused on self sustain, with spells that focus on self healing based on maximum health.
&eSpellblades combine the lethal rogues with the use of magic.
&7A series of books with elemental melee spells.
ftbquests.chapter.e_spell_books.quests10: &eAstral magic is the combination of Arcane, Fire and Frost magics.
&7Use the power of the astral elements to cast three different spells of each element. You can use an ultimate spell that will change according to the elements used.
&cWith a total of &l39&r&c possible spells, this is the hardest spell book.
ftbquests.chapter.e_spell_books.quests11: &7An archery book that combines archery with frost magic, focusing on crowd control with stuns.
&7An archery book made for lethal rogue archers, focusing on fast gameplay.
&7An archery book that combines archery with fire magic, focusing on high damage with burning and explosions.
ftbquests.chapter.e_spell_books.quests12: &eEvolutions of technique books, slightly more advanced.
&7An enigmatic evolution of the Arcane Techniques.
&7A frozen evolution of the Frost Techniques.
&7A pyromantic evolution of the Fire Techniques.
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.title: &fMoon
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests1.subtitl: The &6rover&r is a land vehicle capable of driving on the rough terrain of &emoons &6and &bplanets&r. It's &aexceptionally fast&r, has an &binventory &6capable of &astoring eight items &6and has &atwo seats &6for &cmultiple riders&r. To use it, fill the rover with &cfuel &6(&eshift-click&r and place &cfuel buckets &6in the &cleft input slot&r).&r
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests2.title: Craft a &2Solar Panel
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests2.subtitl: The &bsolar panel&r is an upgraded version of the &ccoal generator&r, procucing more energy per tick while being &6self-reliant&r. Its power generation depends on the planet's distance from the &csun &6and &bfog&r. Because of this, it is more efficient to place &bsolar panels&r close to the &csun&r. &bsolar panels&r also produce more energy in &borbit&r, as there is no &catmosphere&r blocking the &dlight&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests5.title: Defeat &4Corrupted Lunarian
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests6.title: Defeat &4Star Crawler
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests7.subtitl: The &boxygen distributor&r is a powerful machine that distributes &boxygen&r in a sealed room, allowing any &clife&r inside to survive. It works exactly like an &coxygen loader&r, where you insert &bwater&r into the tank, but instead of giving you &boxygen&r, the &boxygen&r is distributed into the &cair&r.
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests8.subtitl: The &bwater pump&r is essential for keeping the &boxygen distributor&r running infinitely. To use it, place an &binfinite water source&r below, then place the &bwater pump&r above one of the water blocks, and then place the &boxygen distributor&r adjacent to it. Make sure to supply both the &bwater pump&r and the &boxygen distributor&r with sufficient &cpower&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests9.title: Exploration
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests10.title: Moon
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests13.title: to &4Mars
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests13.subtit: Now that you have explored the &emoon&r and worked with &ddesh&r, you want to take it further and go to the &cred planet&r. Building a &ctier two rocket&r capable of travelling to &bMars&r is similar to building the &btier one rocket&r, but with &ddesh materials&r instead of &bsteel&r. Construct the parts, build the rocket in the &bNASA workbench&r, fuel it up, and off you go to &bMars&r!&r
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests14.title: Craft a &8Launch Pad
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests15.title: Obtain &6Desh
ftbquests.chapter.flmoon.quests15.subtit: The &dDesh Ingot&r is a crafting component in &bAd Astra&r. It's found in caves on &eThe Moon&r, mainly under Y level 2. Aside from the &cTier 2 Rocket&r, &dDesh&r is also a component in the &cTier 1 Rover&r, as well as the &cOxygen Distributor&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.gadgets.title: &eGadgets
ftbquests.chapter.gadgets.quests10.subti: This quest line is about discovering the unique and quirky items/blocks in Prominence, which could even help with some of the tech mods!
ftbquests.chapter.gadgets.quests11.subti: Blank Plates are the basis towards Effect Plates. Stepping on an Effect Plate will give you the designated effect.
ftbquests.chapter.gadgets.quests18.subti: Mob Filters are blocks that only a select few entities can go through.
ftbquests.chapter.gadgets.quests19.subti: Copper pans are an earlygame alternative to ore farms commonly found in tech mods like Create. When putting sand/gravel underneath and water above, they will rarely generate ore nuggets, gravel, emeralds, and a few other miscellaneous items.
ftbquests.chapter.gadgets.quests20.subti: Cog Blocks are pretty much just redstone but they can be placed in the air.
ftbquests.chapter.gear_mariums_soulslike: &bSoul Weaponry
Lunar Source
These two stones are going to be important into the creation of your soul equipment, remember to harvest a lot.
Soul Crafting
Lost Souls are another source of power for these soul equipment and block creation, you can find some by smelting soul sand.
Living Iron
Soul Infused Ingots are one of the main ingredients in crafting the soul equipment as they contain the essence of lost souls.
Building Blocks of the Soul
Decorative blocks used in some structures of the great monsters hidden away. Great for a building theme too.
Soul Ammo

These Silver Bullets will be very important to your soul ranged weaponry as they are the main use for such bullets. Silver Bullets may be cheap but depending on how often you use it, it'll be your debt.
Boom! Headshot!
The Hunter Pistol is a simple firearm that will use silver bullets but have a fairly quick reload.
You Can't Talk to a Human, With a Shotgun in Their Hand..
The Hunter Blunderbuss is a shotgun that will use up silver bullets to release a blast of projectiles at the targets.
Walking Man-O-War

The Hunter Cannon is a heavy weapon that requires 10 silver bullets to fire as it'll combine all the bullets into one cannonball shot. It has a long reload so you cannot shoot this in rapid succession easily.
Say Hello to my little friend!

The Gatling Gun is a heavy gun that will take time to load up and start firing at a rapid pace. It'll eat up your bullets quickly so be sure to use this gun only when you have a lot of silver bullets.
Rabbit Hunting Season
Yes, you've read it, it's Big Chungus, gather 9 of these emeralds by killing Chunguses and craft the music disc.
False Soul Weapons
Cheap imitations of what a true soul equipment are, used by fallen fighters such as Remnants.
Lunar Tools
These tools are so durable, that they even might be stronger than diamond.
Guiding Moon
Such a peculiar compass, they seem to be pointing somewhere far away, where do they point to?
Here lies a great champion, unable to find peace and rest. You must kill him and send his body back to the earth.
Find the Champion's Grave
Here stands a king who lost it all, end his false reign and emerge victorious.
Fall of a Kingdom
A powerful soul of a fallen leader and a heart of a decaying demon. You have freed the king who couldn't die.
Exorcism
A powerful soul of a great champion and a powerful essence of a ghost. You have freed the dead and now they have fallen back to the earth to rest.
Fallen Puppet
A powerful soul who was under control of a dark force and a pure moonstone radiating with powerful energy. But couldn't we have done anything else?
Retribution
You have brought back a fallen knight to their rightful body, and now you faced him in his former glory.
The Abyss Stares Back
A powerful soul of an embodiment of decay, the Wither, and it dropped a shard emanating chaotic energy, what is it for?
Essence of the Dragon
A powerful soul of the last known dragon in the End. You are now able to harness its power.
Moonwalker
The lunar ring grants the wearer the ability to launch magical waves for a short time, granting the wearer to even shoot from afar with just their hands.
Imitation Moon
Making use of the moonstone you found, you decided to see if you are able to create a powerful weapon.
It's lacking..
After inserting a powerful soul into the swords, they now seem to have awakened with the power of the moon.
Knight's Inheritance
You obtained the knight's personal weapon and chest piece and are now able to call upon the moon's power as your own.
ALERT!
This sword is interesting, it allows the holder to sense nearby hostiles, may be useful in a raid perhaps?
This weapon is a bit weird, it can transform into a different weapon with a different ability when wanted.
The Smell of Decay is near...
What must compel you to create such an item? To summon a great demon or something evil?
Living Robes
The robes of a dark sorcerer, infused with the power of souls, fairly durable.
Living Armor, but not really
You can hear the souls within the armor as they have been infused into the metal, more durable than iron.
Back in my Day..
These wandering demons are found in the crimson forests, wandering around as empty husks of killing instinct..
Can You Feel My Heart Beating?
A heart of a dying demon, still containing powerful vitality, perhaps we could make use of it?
It All Comes From The Heart
A condensed form of demon vitality, very disgusting if you think about it.
Iron Heart
An ingot made of infused demon hearts. It radiates demonic energy, perfect for soul equipment.
No One Can Stop Death...
A powerful scythe, crafted by using powerful soul metal to create a weapon that represents death. Summon the dead to do your bidding.
Long Forgotten...
Forgotten elite soldiers, can be found wandering around the Soul Sand Valley, but can be summoned to do your bidding.
One of the Forgotten
An equipment solely found by killing Evil Forlorns, put them to rest and be remembered.
It's Time to Purge
A weapon that do true magic damage based on each hit and fire aspect level, but only above a third of the target's health.
Shooting Star
A spear with the power of a speeding comet, ready to crash against any target.
Escape like the Wind
A good bow that can boost a wielder's speed the more their string is pulled in their non-dominant hand.
The Night is My Might
A simple but effective weapon that gets stronger when night falls.
I'm Thirsty...
A weapon containing demonic energy. It's sole purpose is to heal the wielder in exchange for blood of their targets.
THEN PAY WITH YOUR BLOOD!
A soul weapon that hosts the power of a true demon.
Even the Scales!
An unevolved scythe that is ready to harvest souls, but what souls do you want to harvest?
Freeze the World
A decimating axe that freezes enemies and makes them explode with chunks of ice upon death.
Gamble Your Life Away
A very peculiar staff that forces the wielder to gamble for effects that may or may not be beneficial to the wielder's battles.
Thor's Personal Weapon, the hammer is a devastating weapon that can summon lightning.
Arise, ye tarnished souls
A decimating mace wielded by a fallen knight, used to summon the souls of fallen soldiers.
By Your Will
A legendary sword with a mind of its own and can fight for you without holding it.
Blood Dancer
A scythe evolved from absorbing red souls, and allows the wielder to heal the more they attack mobs when ability is not on cooldown.
Among the Shadows
A scythe evolved from absorbing blue souls, and allows the wielder to have speed and damage during the first few seconds upon combat.
The Smell of Decay is Near..
A dangerous monster, summoned from the pedestal using the shard, will decay anything it walks on, the Monarch of Chaos. Slay him and receive his personal equipment.
Kill the Monarch of Chaos
Everything Starts
This is where everything starts, with a single soul sand. Are you ready to fight dangerous monsters and earn your own soul equipment?
Find the Cathedral of Resurrection
Here lies a fallen knight. Free him using a lost soul onto the altar.
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.title: &eGetting Started
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quests: &aFirst Steps
Click me and read my description!
&eAs a flameborn, you were created and sent by S'kellak to this place; The Overworld, with an important purpose you must seek answers for.
Enter the Overworld
&f&lHow To&r: &aQuesting!
Click me and read my description!
&7The &6questbook&7 is very important in Prominence, and will guide you through most of the game's progression.
&7To easily access the &6questbook&7, you can click the book icon at the top left of your inventory.
&7When you open a quest, the left side shows what tasks you need to do to finish the quest, and the right side shows what rewards you will get.
Find a fruit or vegetable!
&e&lUpgrading:&f &fChests
Mine some copper and use the &eBlank Chest Upgrade&r to make a copper upgrade for your &6chests&r!
&f&lHow To: &r&aChapters
Click me and read my description!
To open the &2Quest Chapters&r screen, close this quest and move your cursor to the left. Each chapter has a different set of quests that fit into that theme.
Click here!
&f&lHow To&r: &aCraft a Chest
Craft a &6chest&r - which is later upgradeable.
Craft a Chest
&e&lUpgrading:&f Inventory
Click me and read my description!
To equip a &9backpack&r, click the Equip icon in the &9backpack&r menu.
Once a &9backpack&r is equipped, you can open it by pressing &bB&r
&9Backpacks&r can be upgraded through several tiers. &9Backpacks&r with special benefits can be found in loot chests.
To see all &9backpack&r variants, search &d@traveler&r in the &eREI&r search bar.
You can find this search bar at the bottom of your inventory.
Clicking on items in the item list to the right of your inventory will show their recipes and uses.
You can also press &bR&r and &bU&r while hovering over any item to see their Recipe and Uses
&e&lMultiplayer: &dClaiming
Click me and read my description!
Press &a[M]&r to open the &eWorld Map&r.
To &eclaim a chunk&r, you simply need to right click on top of a chunk, and select &eClaim Selected&r.
Some servers may have lower claim limits than normal. Stay mindful of this limit, so you don't run out.
Click to continue!
&6&lWelcome to Prominence!
&eContinue your journey through the other Chapters!
Click here to continue!
&f&lThe Basics: &dTeleporting
The easiest way to teleport between locations is to use &eWaystones&r. Waystones generate naturally in villages and are also craftable.
Use a Waystone!
&d&lProgression: &e&lTalents
Click me and read my description!
&7The Talent Tree, along with leveling, is the most important method of player progression in Prominence, as with it you can increase your stats and unlock new abilities.
&7It is directly tied to leveling, as you will receive a talent point every 2 levels.
&7You can open it by pressing &eN&7, to reset it, you can use a &eKnowledge Scroll&7. This item will get consumed on use and your talent points will get refunded.
Click here to continue
&f&lThe Basics: &e&lRarities \& Reforging
Click to read my description!

&7All tools will have a random &erarity&7. This will affect their stats. To improve the rarity, you can &ereforge the tools&7 using the second tab in the anvil. You will require &ea tool-specific material&7 and &eone of the 3 ores&7 to successfully change its rarity. &cYou can read the "Reforging" tutorial for more info!
Obtain an Anvil
&d&lProgression:&6&l Leveling Up
Click me and read my description!
&7A core aspect of your player progression is leveling, displayed at the top left of your inventory.
&7It grows with combat experience, such as fighting enemies, or defeating bosses. It allows to scale up enemies to your level, and serves as a progression requirement to fight certain bosses.
&7Each level you get an increase in maximum health.
&eFor some boss fights, it's an essential part to be on their required level! The boss' quest will show on its description the recommended level if they do have one.
&cPlayer Level is a different level than the experience level from your hotbar!
Click here to continue
&d&lProgression:&e&l Level Limits
Click me and read my description!
&7The maximum level you can reach is tied to your Campaign Progression.
&7If you are stuck at a level and you cannot go up, then you haven't unlocked the next level.
- &e1-10 Leveling:
&7Unlocked by default
- &e11-50 Leveling:
&7Unlocked by defeating the first boss of the &dVoid's Invasion&7 campaign.
- &e51-65 Leveling:
&7Unlocked by starting the &eHasturian Era&7 campaign.
&6Level 65 is the current maximum level.
Continue
&ePro Tip: &7Check the wiki!
Click me and read my description!
&eYou can find Prominence's Official Wiki at &9https://rpg.prominence.wiki &8(Link isn't clickable)

&7It has over 6 hours of content you can read, ranging more in-depth tutorials, advanced guides, guides to specific mods, lore, useful tips and guides, and more! And the best part is that it's expanding mroe and more with time!
Continue
&ePro Tip: &7Do the tutorials!
Click me and read my description!
&eThe Tutorial questlines are essential information that you must know.
&7Some also say that it's the way of obtaining the Eternal Knowledge.
Continue
&bIndustrial Revolution
Welcome to Industrial Revolution!
Welcome to Industrial Revolution, a Tech mod that offers tools, weapons and ways of generating resources.
Welcome to Industrial Revolution
A turquoise dust with helpful properties for making machines.
An iron ingot enhanced via infusion with Nikolite.
Infusing Nikolite Dust with Diamond Dust seems to enhance its properties.
An ingot sparking with the energy of Enriched Nikolite.
Allows for the upgrading of machines to MK2, this speeds up processing and allows for 2 enhancers to be installed.
Allows for the upgrading of machines to MK3, this speeds up processing and allows for 3 enhancers to be installed.
Allows for the upgrading of machines to MK4, this speeds up processing and allows for 4 enhancers to be installed.

The Mining Rig Computer allows you to generate ores using rf. 

To set it up you need: 
1. A Mining Rig Computer.
2. 1-8 Mining Rig Drills.
3. 1-8 Drill Heads.
4. An Encoded Ore Data Card.

Note: Higher tier drill heads allow for faster generation of ores.
Drill Head
The base of tier 1 machines.
The base of tier 2 machines.
The base of tier 3 machines.
The base of tier 4 machines.
Machine Configuration
The screwdriver allows for the configuration of input and output sides of machines as well as the energy cube.
A simple machine that uses LF to smelt items.
Highest tier of the Electric Furnace, allowing for 5 items too be processed at once.
Allows for the pulverization of a multitude of materials.
The highest-tier pulverizer, allowing for 5 items too be processed at once.
The basis of most Industrial Revolution machines.
In order to use an fluid pipe you need a retriever servo or output servo.
A Retriever Servo attempts to pull into the machine its pointing into from all other machines that are connected to the pipes.
A Retriever Servo attempts to pull from machine its pointing into into other machines that are connected to the pipes.
In order to use an item pipe you need a retriever servo or output servo.
Lets you make plates without the use of a hammer, as well as the creation of enhancers to improve the performance of your machines.
Highest tier of the Compressor, allowing for 5 items too be processed at once.
Vital in the creation of higher tier materials as it's the only machine capable of infusing nikolite dust with other materials to enhance its capabilities.
Highest tier of the solid infuser, allowing for 5 items too be processed at once.
A machine allowing for the extraction of more planks per log, as well as sawdust.
The highest-tier Sawmill.
Allows for the automatic placing of saplings and chopping of trees. Requires an axe to function.
Allows for the automatic harvesting and planting of crops.
A machine that kills mobs using the supplied sword.
A machine that can automatically breed and kill animals.
Automatically collects any liquid above it.
Allows for the extraction of liquids found in the world.
A basic form of LF storage.
The highest tier energy storage in Industrial Revolution.
Equivalent to a Iron Pickaxe, uses LF instead of durability.
Equivalent to a Stone Pickaxe, uses LF instead of durability.
Equivalent to a Diamond Pickaxe, uses LF instead of durability.
Equivalent to a Netherite Pickaxe, uses LF instead of durability.\n\n This tool also allows for modules to be installed using the Modular Workbench.

In order to use the Mining Rig Computer you're going to need a encoded ore data card.

This can be created in the Data Card Encoder by supplying 64 of the ore you want to encode and an Ore Data Card. 

You can also increase the richness of the cards by using Enriched Nikolite at 16 per 1%%. Higher Richness levels increase the amount of ores gained per operation.
A machine that allows for automatic fishing. Requires a fishing rod and a water source block adjacent to the machine.
A passive form of power gen, needing only sunlight to function.
An upgrade to the Solar Generator.
The most basic generator, consuming burnable fuels to produce LF.
A generator that allows for the seeds and other plant matter to be used as a means of power generation if first turned into biomass.
The highest LF/t generator in Industrial Revolution. It consumes lava to generate LF.

A small device that reads the energy stored in a machine as well as the potential LF consumption of said machine.\n\nThis can be particularly useful when trying to figure out the LF consumption of machines with enhancers in them.

Step by step for charging a Core of Modularity: 

1. Place down your capsule with the Laser Emitter(s) facing it with a 3 block gap between it/them and the Capsule. 

2. Place your Core of Modularity (uncharged) in the Capsule.

3. Power the Laser Emitter(s) by routing LF into the back of it/them.

4. Apply a redstone signal to your Laser Emitter(s)

If you want to automate the shutdown of your lasers it may be helpful to know that a comparator outputs a signal when the Capsule is empty or done crafting.

Used to charge cores of modularity.\n\nBe careful to not apply a redstone signal to your laser emitter when the capsule is empty as this will destroy the capsule. Also, applying a redstone signal to the laser emitter when it's not facing a Capsule will result in it exploding after a bit of time.
A Helmet that allows for the installation of modules.
A Chestplate that allows for the installation of modules.
A pair of Leggings that allows for the installation of modules.
A pair of Boots that allows for the installation of modules.
&eThis is a meme weapon, please don't use it unironically, it's bad.
Color Modules
Can be found as dungeon loot.
Any Color Module
Used for creating plates before making a compressor.
A tool that allows you to rotate blocks and break machines by right-clicking while crouching.
Heat
Mainly used to make coolant and processing ores. Can also make wither-proof obsidian.
The highest-tier fluid infuser.
The highest-tier Slaughter.
The highest-tier Farmer.
The highest-tier Chopper.
The highest-tier Rancher.
The base for all enhancers.
Increases the LF capacity of a machine by 25k LF per upgrade.
A block that allows you to charge the items in your hand and your armor when standing on it. Connect power to the bottom of the block.
A machine to create biomass for the biomass generator.
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.title: &2Overworld
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests0.subt: The &bcompressor&r is a machine that allows &aingots&r to be compressed into &eplates&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests1.subt: The &aNasa Workbench&r is used to craft rockets of all tiers.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests2.subt: The &bTier 1 Rocket&r is the first rocket the player can craft in order to go to space.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests3.subt: The first suit you will craft in &aAd Astra&r is the standard &bSpace Suit&r. This suit provides the bare minimum, allowing you to travel to less dangerous locations, like the &dMoon&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests4.subt: Inside the &aOxygen Loader&r, &eBuckets of Water&r can be placed inside, turning it into &bOxygen&r. This &bOxygen&r can then be placed inside &cOxygen Tanks&r and consumed as if they're a food item, which will cause them to enter your &dSpace Suit&r. Alternatively, you can directly add &bOxygen&r to a &dSpace Suit&r, which is recommended.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests6.desc: - A &aSpace Station&r is a pre-built structure that is created in the planet selection screen, provided you have the necessary materials. Space stations are always located in a moon or planet's orbit and provide the ability to place blocks in that orbit dimension.&r
- Space stations are designed to be expanded upon, allowing you to build the base of your dreams over a &cmoon/planet&r. They always spawn in whatever position you launched your&r.
rocket at, so remember the coordinates to avoid losing the structure.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests8.subt: The &bCoal Generator&r is a generator that allows early power generation. It burns &fcoal&r to produce energy.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests14.sub: The &aFuel Refinery&r is a machine that is used to turn &coil&r into &efuel&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests15.sub: The &bSteel Ingot&r is a basic crafting component in &aAd Astra&r. In conjunction with the &bSteel Plate&r, it's mainly used for crafting the &bTier 1 Rocket&r and steel building blocks, as well as other items.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests16.des: - To place your newly-created &crocket&r, you must build a &blaunchpad&r.&r
- After the &blaunch pad&r has been built, place the &erocket&r in the&r.
ftbquests.chapter.l2e3fr37h.quests18.des: &lPreparing to Launch Place these items in the&r
- Follow these steps very carefully! Missing even one thing here could make your life tough, or worse, cause you to be stranded on the &dmoon&r!&r

- In order to return to &aearth&r from the &dmoon&r, you need two basic things: a &blaunch pad&r and three &bbuckets of fuel&r. (inventory of your rocket, and ensure that you always have them every time you launch a rocket).&r

- Finally, you should bring multiple &ffull oxygen tanks&r, plentiful &ffood&r, &csoul torches&r or &eglowstone&r, &aweapons&r and &atools&r. Once you have this, you are ready to launch! Enter the &erocket&r and press &aSpace&r!&r
ftbquests.chapter.l9ve6nu4s.title: &eVenus
ftbquests.chapter.l9ve6nu4s.quests1.subt: &dCalorite&r is used to craft the &eultimate rocket&r capable of travelling to a new solar system and more!&r
ftbquests.chapter.l9ve6nu4s.quests7.desc: - The &bJet Suit&r is an upgraded version of the &cNetherite Space Suit&r, with more protection, additional oxygen storage, and &eflight&r. It's expensive to craft, but it offers high-speed flight, making travel easy.&r

- It's got two modes of flight: ascending (&aSpace&r) and boosted (&aSpace + Left&r). Ascending makes the wearer fly upwards, while boosted is similar to an elytra that's constantly being propelled by fireworks. The &bJet Suit&r is powered by energy and must be charged to fly. It can be charged with an&r
&benergizer&r by right-clicking it with the &bjet suit&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.l9ve6nu4s.quests13.des: - Once you have found enough &dCalorite&r to craft a &etier four rocket&r, you will be able to leave this solar system and enter a new one. The first planet that you will head to in &dProxima Centauri&r is &aGlacio&r. Glacio is brutally cold;&r
however, it has &b&oxygen&r, allowing you to survive there without a &dspacesuit&r.&r
ftbquests.chapter.lcmer6cury.title: &cMercury
ftbquests.chapter.lfgl7atio.title: &bGlacio
ftbquests.chapter.lfgl7atio.quests8.desc: - A &aSpace Station&r is a pre-built structure that is created in the planet selection screen, provided you have the necessary materials. Space stations are always located in a &bmoon or planet's orbit&r and provide the ability to place blocks in that orbit dimension.&r
- Space stations are designed to be expanded upon, allowing you to build the base of your dreams over a &bmoon/planet&r. They always spawn in whatever position you launched your&r.
rocket at, so remember the coordinates to avoid losing the structure.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.title: &d&lVoid's Invasion
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests0.des: &7&oThe Gauntlet, once the vigilant watcher and first herald of the Nether, hath now fallen to the dark embrace of the Void. Slaved upon being one of the Void's heralds, it now threatens its own realm with its destruction.
&7&oThou may find the Gauntlet locked within a monolithic prison. Shatter its eye, and thou shalt unleash the now corrupted beeing.
&eTip: &7This boss has strong hits and may one shot you if playing on Normal or Hard difficulty! Try to dodge or craft defensive potions!

&7&oEl Guantelete, una vez el vigilante y primer heraldo del Nether, ahora ha cado por el oscuro abrazo del Vaco. Esclavizado como uno de sus heraldos, amenaza con la destruccin de su propio reino, el Nether.
&7&oPuedes encontrar el Guantelete encerrado dentro de una prisin monoltica. Rompe su ojo y desatars a la bestia ahora corrompida.
&eTip: &7Este jefe tiene ataques fuertes que pueden matarte de un golpe si juegas en dificultad Normal o Difcil! Intenta evadir los ataques o haz pociones defensivas.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests1.tit: &f &9The Night Lich, King of All Kings
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests1.des: &7&oThe long deceased souls of all the kings of the Kingdom of Ly'rell hath been resurrected and corrupted by the Void, now known as a single monster called the Night Lich.
&7&oThe Night Lich dwelleth upon the surface of the Overworld. Seek him in the colder biomes, within the remnants of a broken tower.
&7&oTo find this structure, use Souls Stars, dropped by undead creatures, which shall guide thee to the tower.
&eTip: &7This is a ranged boss, use a flying mount if you are melee, or a bow as secondary weapon!

&7&oLas almas de los antiguos reyes del Reino de Ly'rell, quienes han fallecido hace mucho tiempo, han sido resucitadas y corruptas por el Vaco, formando un gran monstruo ahora conocido como el Liche Nocturno.
&7&oEn los biomas ms fros, en la cima de los restos de una gran torre rota, yacen ellos atrapados.
&7&oPara encontrar esta estructura, usa las Estrellas de Alma, cadas de criaturas no muertas, que te guiarn hasta la torre.
&eTip: &7Este jefe es rango, usa una montura voladora si eres melee, o un arco como arma secundaria!
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests1.tas: Obtain and use at least 4 Soul Stars
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests2.des: &7The Blackstone Golem, the Nether's final Herald, is a formidable creature that can be summoned through its ritual within the Nether.
&7Construct a 9x9 platform of any kind of Blackstone, with Chiseled Polished Blackstone Holders in the middle of each side.
&7Place a shard of gilded blackstone upon each holder to commence the ritual.
&7El Glem de Piedra Negra, el ltimo Heraldo del Nether, es un formidable golem que puede ser invocado a travs de su propio ritual dentro del Nether.
&7Construye una plataforma de 9x9 utilizando cualquier tipo de Piedra Negra, con soportes de Piedra Negra Pulida Cincelada en el medio de cada lado.
&7Coloca un fragmento de piedra negra dorada sobre cada soporte para comenzar el ritual.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests3.des: &7The Old Champion's Remains can be found in its grave, hidden underground at the Overworld. This skeleton-like figure, who was once a great champion, now has been possessed by another being.
&8His attacks revolve around if he is guarded, switching between the shielding stances with the attacks.
&7Los Restos del Viejo Campen se encuentran en su tumba, oculta bajo tierra en el Supramundo. Esta figura esqueltica, que alguna vez fue un gran campen, ha sido poseda por otro ser.
&8Sus ataques giran en torno a si est protegido, alternando entre posturas defensivas y ataques.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests4.des: &7Obsidilith, the living monolith, is the pillar of the void's influence in the End.
&7Located at its own platform, a giant, eldritch structure that can be found floating in the end. To make it appear, use an eye of ender on the top of its platform.
&7Obsidilith, el monolito viviente, es el pilar de la influencia del vaco en El End.
&7Ubicado en su propia plataforma, una estructura gigantesca y extraa, que se encuentra flotando en El End. Para invocarlo, usa un ojo de ender en la cima de su plataforma.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests5.des: &7The raw essence of the end, the "Ender", has been corrupted by the void's presence. The Ender's Eye needs to be defeated to establish balance in the now desolated dimension.

&7The Eye can only be summoned at an Eye Shrine. The Shrine is built with a base of a 55 obsidian platform and a 33 centered crying obsidian layer. On all edges an end rod has to get placed. On top of the shrine thy shall sacrifice the dragon egg. The Eye can only get called in The end dimension.
&7La esencia pura del End, el "Ender", ha sido corrompida por la presencia del vaco. El Ojo del Ender debe ser derrotado para restablecer el equilibrio en la ahora desolada dimensin.

&7El Ojo solo puede ser invocado en un Santuario del Ojo. El Santuario se construye sobre una plataforma de obsidiana de 5x5 y una capa central de obsidiana llorosa de 3x3. En cada borde se debe colocar una barra de ender. En la cima del santuario, debers t sacrificar el huevo de dragn. El Ojo solo puede ser invocado en la dimensin del End.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests6.des: &7This giant eye serves as the eternal watcher of the Prison of the Damned, residing within its own Lair deep in the Prison.
&7To challenge it, thou must first obtain a Vine Rune from the Promenade of the Condemned. With this rune, gain access to the Lair and face the eye in battle.
&7Este ojo gigante sirve como el vigilante eterno de la Prisin de los Condenados, residiendo en su propia Guarida, a las profundidades de la Prisin.
&7Para desafiarlo, primero debes obtener una Runa de Vid, obtenida en Paseo de los Condenados. Con esta runa, accede a su Guarida y enfrntate al ojo en batalla.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests7.des: &7&oJean, once a noble and great emerald dragon, hath succumbed to the dark tendrils of the Void. Now corrupted and consumed by the Void's wrath, she dwelleth at the heart of the End, now known as the Ender Dragon.
&7&oShe is no simple feat, for the Void hath bestowed upon her formidable powers, driven by a strong and unquenchable rage known as the Ender.

&7&oTo unlock the ancient portal to the End, thou must seek out twelve of the sixteen unique eyes. These eyes are scattered throughout the vast expanse of the Overworld and the burning depths of the Nether.

&7&oJean, la noble y gran dragona esmeralda, ha sucumbido a las oscuras garras del Vaco. Ahora corrupta y consumida por la ira del mismo, ronda por el corazn del End, conocida ahora como la Dragona del Ender.
&7&oElla no es un reto sencillo, pues el Vaco le ha otorgado poderes formidables, impulsados por una furia fuerte e insaciable conocida como el Ender.

&7&oPara desbloquear el antiguo portal al End, debes buscar doce de los diecisis ojos nicos. Estos ojos estn esparcidos a lo largo de la vasta extensin del Overworld y las ardientes profundidades del Nether.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests8.des: &7&oDeep within Vaaz, the primordial volcano from where everything originated, dwells the Living Statue, S'kellak, creator of all things.
&7&oHe upholds the delicate balance across all dimensions and has waged countless battles to stave off the destruction of the realms.
&7&oEn las profundidades de Vaaz, el volcn primordial de donde todo se origin, habita la Estatua Viviente, S'kellak, el creador de todo lo que exista.
&7&ol mantiene el delicado equilibrio a lo largo de todas las dimensiones y ha luchado incontables batallas para evitar la destruccin de los reinos.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests9.des: &o&7Yet now, after eons have passed, S'kellak lays weaker than ever before. A dire shadow blooms, an eldritch force known as The Void.

&o&7For ages, S'kellak has contained The Void, but with his strength now dwindling, the shadow surges, plotting to breach and destroy all realms. What once were serene beings shall be twisted into deadly aberrations, as corruption spreads its vile tendrils. The time of reckoning draws nigh.
&o&7Y ahora, tras eones, S'kellak yace ms dbil que nunca. Una sombra amenaza florece, una fuerza ancestral, conocida como El Vaco.

&o&7Durante eras, S'kellak ha contenido a este, pero con su poca fuerza, la sombra se alza, tramando corromper y destruir todos los reinos. Aquellos que antes eran seres serenos sern retorcidos en aberraciones mortales, mientras la corrupcin extiende sus viles tentculos. El tiempo de la destruccin se avecina.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests10.de: &o&7S'kellak hath discovered a source of unbalance within the realms. All dimensions now bear the taint of the void's horrid presence.
&o&7Once serene creatures have been twisted into powerful aberrations by its corrupting touch. The fate of the realms rests upon thee.
&o&7S'kellak descubri una fuente de desequilibrio en los reinos. Todas las dimensiones ahora llevan la mancha de la horrenda presencia del Vaco.
&o&7Las criaturas que antes eran serenas han sido retorcidas en poderosas aberraciones por su toque corruptor. El destino de los reinos descansa sobre ti.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests11.de: &7&oWith the defeat of the dimensional threats and the restoration of the realms's balance, S'kellak, The Eternal Flame, spoke directly to the champion.
&6"In recognition of your valor and dedication,"&r &7&oS'kellak's voice resonated,&r &6"I bestow upon you a fragment of my essence, the Molten Core."
&7This gift, illuminated by S'kellak's power, signifies both the hero's triumph and a pledge of continued protection for the realms.
&7&oCon la derrota de las amenazas, y la restauracin del equilibrio de los reinos, S'kellak, El Fuego Eterno, habl directamente al campen.
&6"En reconocimiento a tu valor y dedicacin,"&r &7&oLa voz de S'kellak reson,&r &6"te otorgo un fragmento de mi esencia, el Ncleo Fundido."
&7Este regalo, iluminado por el gran poder de S'kellak, simboliza tanto el triunfo del hroe como una promesa de proteccin continua de los reinos.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests12.de: &7The Ender's Essence has been defeated, but its essence escaped the empty void, and a rift was formed in the End. Something is coming.
&7Deep in the end, strange voices are now whispering &8&o"The King in Yellow is near"&r.
&7La Esencia del Ender ha sido derrotada, pero su esencia escap del vaco vaco, y una grieta se ha formado en el End. Algo se acerca.
&7En lo profundo del End, extraas voces ahora susurran &8&o"El Rey en Amarillo se aproxima"&r.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests13.de: &eThe invasion has been halted, for now.&r

&6"We must prepare for what lies ahead  a new form of magic that we're unfamiliar with, known as the corruption. I'll go on a quest to discover a new material that could offer us a fighting chance against it.

&6As for you, that molten core is nothing but a vessel. You will need the essences of ancient beings. Once harnessed, these essences will empower it to be able to forge the formidable artifacts. It is your mission to obtain them." &e&oS'kellak explained.
&eLa invasin ha sido detenida, por ahora.&r
&6"Debemos prepararnos para lo que se avecina  una nueva forma de magia que desconocemos, conocida como la corrupcin. Ir en busca de un nuevo material que podra darnos una oportunidad contra ella.

&6En cuanto a ti, ese Ncleo Fundido no es ms que un recipiente. Necesitars las esencias de seres antiguos. Una vez dominadas, estas esencias lo empoderarn para forjar armas de artefacto. Tu misin es obtenerlas." &e&oexplic S'kellak.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests14.de: &7Baphomet, the Ancient Great Demon of Magic, holds a powerful demonic essence.
&7To summon it you must make a complex ritual using dark magic, which can be read using the Book of Shadows.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests15.de: &7By using the Essence of Eventide on the Old Moon Altar, you will return the true heir back to its original body. This will result in the summoning of the Fallen Icon, a fierce empowered version of the Returning Knight with a fast and dangerous second phase. When summoned, it will affect anyone nearby with Weakness, Nausea, and Slowness.

&7Al usar la Essence of Eventide en el Antiguo Altar Lunar, devolvers al verdadero heredero a su cuerpo original. Esto resultar en la invocacin del cono Cado, una versin feroz y ms fuerte del Antiguo Campen, con una segunda fase rpida y peligrosa. Al ser invocado, dar Debilidad, Nuseas y Lentitud a quienes estn cerca.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests16.su: &7From the spirit of a great leader
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests16.de: &7Must use the Shell Horn, found in the Deep Frozen Ocean. Call upon her in the Ice Maze, near water.
&7When fought, may she be weakened, or else she shall not die.
&7Debes usar el Cuerno encontrado en el Profundo Ocano Congelado. Llmala en el Laberinto de Hielo, cerca del agua.
&7Al luchar, debe ser debilitada, o de lo contrario no caer.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests17.de: &7The primitive seed of creation, the &9Primordial Abyss&7 has the most influence by the cosmic horrors. It is a corrupted land with its own corrupted kind of life, known as the &9aberrations&7.

&7La semilla primitiva de la creacin, el &9Abismo Primordial&7, tiene la mayor influencia de los horrores csmicos. Es una tierra corrompida con su propia forma de vida corrupta, conocidas como las &9aberraciones&7.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests18.de: &7The hasturian wastes are a desolated land full of spikes that are known as the &eSpire Spikes&7. Some of these spikes have an unknown metal blessed by Hastur. It could be the best way to fight against corruption.

&7El desierto hasturiano es una tierra desolada llena de picos que son conocidos como los &ePinchos de Espiral&7. Algunos de estos picos contienen un metal desconocido, bendecido por Hastur. Podra ser la mejor manera de luchar contra la corrupcin.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests19.de: &7With the defeat of the The Eye, the end has been affected by the void's higher forces, &dthe cosmic horrors&7. Eldritch beings that hold pure corruption in their veins.
&7Con la derrota de El Ojo, el End ha sido afectado por las fuerzas superiores del vaco, &dlos horrores csmicos&7. Seres ancestrales que llevan corrupcin pura en sus venas.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests20.de: &eThe Aberrations.&7 They are horrific creatures that live in the Primordial Abyss. Be careful with them, when they hit you, they will apply &9corruption&7 to you, which is stackable. You don't want them to hit you multiple times.

&eLas Aberraciones.&7 Son criaturas horribles que habitan en el Abismo Primordial. Ten cuidado con ellas, cuando te golpean, te aplican &9corrupcin&7, la cual es acumulable. No querrs que te golpeen varias veces.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests21.de: &7The metal from the Spire Spikes, &2Etyr&7, has an unique attribute, it is &2resistant to corruption&7. We could use this metal to prevent the cosmic horrors from corrupting the end.
&7El metal de los Picos de Agujas, &2Etyr&7, tiene una propiedad nica: es &2resistente a la corrupcin&7. Podramos usar este metal para evitar que los horrores csmicos corrompan el End.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests22.de: &6"Let's start the preparations for the summoning.
&6First, we will need a summoning pedestal." &e&oS'kellak explained.
&6Primero, necesitaremos un pedestal de invocacin." &e&oexplic S'kellak.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests23.de: &6"There isn't anything more durable for this than cinderstone, forged directly from the depths of Vaaz. This should be enough to trap its essence, but I'm afraid that I don't know what you could unleash on the process" &e&oS'kellak said

&6"No hay nada ms duradero para esto que la piedraceniza, forjada directamente en las profundidades de Vaaz. Esto debera ser suficiente para atrapar su esencia, pero me temo que no s lo que podras desatar en el proceso." &e&oDijo S'kellak.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests24.de: &6"It is waiting for you. Bring that pedestal to the end and place two of the end's essence, an ender pearl and a end crystal. Be prepared, and don't forget to trap it. You have my blessing, child." &e&oS'kellak said

&6"Te est esperando. Lleva ese pedestal al End y coloca dos esencias del End, una perla de ender y un cristal del End. Preprate, y no olvides atraparlo. Tienes mi bendicin, mi joven." &e&oDijo S'kellak.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests25.de: &7Deep inside the end's rift, a human sized being can be seen casting an unknown spell. Your ritual will be able to interrupt it, and force it to come at you.
&7Null is a powerful and agile boss, it will teleport every time you hit him, and will spawn minions to attack you. Make sure to never stop attacking it, or else it'll heal.
&7En lo profundo de la grieta del End, se puede ver una figura del tamao de un humano lanzando un hechizo desconocido. Tu ritual podr interrumpirlo y obligarlo a enfrentarte.
&7Null es un jefe poderoso y gil; se teletransportar cada vez que lo golpees y convocar esbirros para atacarte. Asegrate de no dejar de atacarlo, o de lo contrario se curar.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests26.de: &6"This is not over yet. That was nothing but a shadow, and now with this rift, I'm afraid we won't be able to do this.

&r&6Unless... we use their own power against them. We could trap one of the heralds of the void inside a vessel, and with it, gather their power. But first, make yourself a better weapon, I'll make the vessel."&e&o S'kellak said.
&eFollow the &cS'kellak's Forge&e questline for more information on forging artifact weapons.
&6"Esto an no ha terminado. Eso no era ms que una sombra, y ahora, con esta grieta, temo que no podramos hacerlo.

&r&6A menos que... usemos su propio poder contra ellos. Podramos atrapar a uno de los heraldos del vaco dentro de un recipiente, y con l, obtener su poder. Pero primero, fabrcate una mejor arma, yo har el recipiente."&e&o dijo S'kellak.
&eSigue la lnea de misiones de la &cS'kellak's Forge&e para ms informacin sobre la creacin de armas artefacto.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests27.de: &7&oRight before Null's imprisonment, it successfuly casted the spell. A big monstrous creature appeared from the rift
&6"The Faceless One is here, another of the void heralds, and the root of corruption" &e&oS'kellak said
&7&oJusto antes del encarcelamiento de Null, logr lanzar el hechizo con xito. Una gran criatura monstruosa apareci desde la grieta.
&6"El Ignoto est aqu, otro de los heraldos del vaco, y el origen de la corrupcin" &e&oDijo S'kellak.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests28.de: &dMythic Challenges&7 are endgame encounters unlocked after beating Null. They are void-infused nightmares created by the now unleashed Faceless being.
&7Each successful fight will grant you a new hourglass with a higher level. The higher the level, the stronger the nightmare is.
&cDying against a mythic boss will fail the challenge, and summon a new lower level hourglass.
&7You can summon them with a &dVoid Hourglass&7. If you misplaced your hourglass, you can get a new one from Null, but its level will be 1.
&dLos Desafos Mticos&7 son encuentros de final de juego que se desbloquean tras derrotar a Null. Son pesadillas infundidas con el vaco, creadas por el ser Ignoto que ha sido liberado.
&7Cada combate exitoso te otorgar un nuevo reloj de arena con un nivel superior. Cuanto mayor sea el nivel, ms fuerte ser la pesadilla.
&cMorir contra un jefe mtico fallar el desafo y convocar un nuevo reloj de arena de un nivel inferior.
&7Puedes invocarlos con un &dReloj de Arena del Vaco&7. Si perdiste tu reloj de arena, puedes obtener uno nuevo de Null, pero su nivel ser 1.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests29.de: &7At the heart of the void's influence, the Primordial Abyss, you may summon the herald of the void, the gruntling faceless being with its dark ritual, by breaking the heart of an aberration on the middle.
&6"Beware, just weaken it, and I'll attempt to bring it down to Vaaz to trap it for eternity. The fate of the realms is on you." &eS'kellak said
&7En el corazn de la influencia del vaco, el Abismo Primordial, puedes invocar al heraldo del vaco, el ser ignoto, con su oscuro ritual, rompiendo el corazn de una aberracin en el centro.
&6"Ten cuidado, solo debiltalo, y yo intentar llevarlo a Vaaz para atraparlo por la eternidad. El destino de los reinos est en tus manos." &eDijo S'kellak.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests29.ta: &9Summon and fight against The Faceless One
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests30.de: &7Magus, the leader of the Hex, is one of the keys for the void to get into the Overworld. He hasn't been corrupted, but he's driven on his own interests and made an accord with the void.
&7He's a powerful mage, its barrier may be weak to certain elements, but the Smite enchant will also help break it.
&eUsing magic or abilities will gather the attention of the Hex. Use a Hexblade on their portal to travel to the Glass Ocean and use a Prismatic Pearl to summon him.
&7Magus, el lder de los Hex, es una de las claves para que el vaco llegue al Overworld. No ha sido corrompido, pero est impulsado por sus propios intereses y ha hecho un pacto con el vaco.
&7Es un poderoso mago, su barrera puede ser dbil ante ciertos elementos, pero el encantamiento Golpeo tambin ayudar a romperla.
&eUsar magia o habilidades va a atraer la atencin de los Hex. Usa una Hexblade en su portal para viajar al Ocano de Cristal, y usa una Perla Prismatica para invocarlo.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests31.de: &6"To summon the last herald, you'll have to go through their own dark magic. You should make a weapon born of true corruption, The Dreadtide, to get yourself mad to attract the dark thoughts from the void, the All-Seeing Eyes; we'll need 4 of them for the ritual.

&9"C' mgepmgah, llll h', c'den ephaiagl ot e'enhe, ymg' ahorna mgah ahf''s nog, ymg' ahorna mgah uh'eog ph'nglui turor" &e&oThe Faceless said, in an unknown tongue
