ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests34.de: &7Found in the Nether, he was cursed by what he thought was his allies. His kingdom was sieged and fell under the lava sea, and the King could only watch helplessly while his mind and body was slowly withering away.

&7Encontrado en el Nether, fue maldecido por quienes pensaba que eran sus aliados. Su reino fue sitiado y cay bajo el mar de lava, y el Rey solo pudo observar impotente mientras su mente y cuerpo se desmoronaban lentamente.
ftbquests.chapter.main_story.quests35.de: &eCampaign bosses have their own level, just like you do as seen at the top of your inventory.
&cThis means that if you are not of a high enough level, you will not deal enough damage to kill them.
&7In total you will deal &c10%% less damage per level difference&7, meaning if you're level 45 and a boss is level 50, you'll deal only 50%% of the total damage you're meant to deal.
ftbquests.chapter.modern_industrializati: &6Modern Industrialization
Engineering School?!
Hello, young technician! I am here to help guide you through the factory world of Modern Industrialization. It may be a bit overwhelming at first, but it won't hurt too much, right?
Remember, this guidebook is very very important in order to progress in case you're lost on what to do. Please take the time and read them when needed.
Are we Blacksmiths?
Such a piece of equipment is surely gonna be important for our uses! It feels like we're doing blacksmith work!
&6Your First Bronze!
Full Steam Ahead! You have now made it to this point of learning how tech works, are you ready for more?

Steam machines will accept inputs from any side, be it items, steam or another fluid. You can lock their slots by clicking on the lock in the interface. Locked slots only accept one type of item or fluid.
Bronze Ingots
Mechanical Press, but more Modern!
This is probably the first machine you will want to build as it saves your hammer from hammering away their durability.
Full Steam Ahead!

Oh, That's Hot! Remember that the boiler is an advanced machinery that is able to power several machines at once and saves fuel efficiently. Don't forget to give it water or else the fuel wastes burning to ashes.

Steam machines need steam to function, and that's exactly what the boiler provides. It will slowly use fuel to heat up. When it's hot enough, it will start to produce steam. Don't forget to feed it with water or your fuel will burn for nothing.
You can also smelt water buckets into steam buckets. Make your first Bronze Compressor before the boiler to save a lot on the plates!

It probably looks expensive to you right now, but don't forget that you can triple ores with the Forge Hammer. Also, as soon as you will have your first two machines, it will become more than twice less expensive!
The boiler will automatically produce and send steam to adjacent machines, up to 8 millibuckets per tick.

Bronze machines can only process recipes up to 2 EU/t, meaning that the recipe will use 2 Energy Units per Tick. As 1 millibucket of steam = 1 EU, a boiler at max temperature can power 4 machines simultaneously!
Sauna but for metals
The Steam Blast Furnace has a similar structure like the Coke Oven, but this is used to create steel. Perhaps this is where the next stage comes.
Reduce, Reuse, Reforge
The Macerator is an interesting machine that allows the recycling of materials and powder them into dust and be reused again.
My Drill Will Pierce the Heavens!
This is a miner's trusty item that will mine tunnels in a 3x3 manner. Remember to always refuel with water and coal like a steam engine!
Is this for baking?
The Mixer will help you mix dusts or fluids for a cheaper price. Just don't put your food ingredients in here, or it'll smell bad.
I'll cut you!
Now this is a perfect machine used to save your materials from being wasted! Use it to cut into any machine part you need, at the cost of some lubricant.
Where's the Fire in Fire Clay?
Dust to dust! Clay to bricks! Making these bricks aren't particularly hard, just turn regular bricks into dust, mix it with some clay and smelt.
Is it to steam food?
The Bronze Furnace is just as slow as a normal furnace, but it uses steam instead of any other fuel source, and cheaper as well.
This is not Coca Cola!

The Coke Oven is meant to make coke fuel, not soda. Remember to power this oven with steam using the input hatch and it will give coke in the output hatch. Always carry a wrench in order to see the multiblock structure.
Coke will be very useful for steel, but it is also a powerful fuel.
I hope that you can find a convenient location for your input and output hatches so it will run smoothly.
Coke is a useful fuel source that is much more powerful than any fuel source, and it is a small requirment for what is to come.
Pump Your Pistons!
The Bronze Pump is good at inserting water into your machinery that requires water, especially boilers. Make sure they're near a water source in order for this to work automatically!
Fluid Transportation
Perfect! Now we can move our fluids properly now! Though it only works with one type of fluid at a time.
&8A Kilogram of Feathers or A Kilogram of Steel?
Steel is the next upgrade to such advanced machinery as it was not only complicated to reach this point, but also shows your ability to think ahead.
Steel Ingots
Coal's Twin
It's a regular coal's twin sibling, nothing different from each other, but handy at least.
You Live, You Learn, You Upgrade
It is time to upgrade your bronze machinery into their steel variants, they have evolved even further than you can imagine.
Infinite resources?

Here we are, it is time to assemble a Steam Quarry, an advanced machinery that uses bronze drills to dig for ores. This will be an expensive machinery but it will be one of your greatest investments of all.
The Steam Quarry is a steam multiblock machine that consumes bronze drills, uses them to dig deeper than the bedrock and gives you back some ores, as you can see in REI.
It's recommended that you have multiple SBFs running before you attempt to build it because it requires a lot of steel.
Bronze drill
Now we're cooking, perhaps there is more to this quarry than just this drill, maybe we can advance even further?
Do not tangle up the wires, okay?
A Steel Wiremill will be useful to create even more sophisticated machinery, but also remember that you need some raw synthetic oil and paper to make rubber sheets and more.
Let's start small first. You never know how this will turn out.
&6I want a Nokia phone now!
You have done well to make it this far. Now that we have moved on from steam, we are now doing even more complicated machinery using electricity, but the results are rewarding.
Item Transportation
Now we can force items to be transported! Remember to force a connection with the pipes into machineries so they will transport them when needed.
Machine Parts, ASSEMBLE!!
The Assembler is a sophisticated machinery that will automate almost all of your machinery parts, but remember to make more of them to make it easier.
Can we boil our food now? No?

I feel like we're creating a Steam Engine with how much bigger these boilers get. Anyway, this is an upgraded version of your already known boilers, they use up more fuel but their output is tremendous.
Is this my electric fan?
The Steam Turbine uses steam to produce electricity. But there will be more upgrades to this certain turbine so remember to make a lot of these to power your electrical machinery.
Can we create Magnemite?
The Polarizer is a unique machinery that adds in magnet like properties to certain machinery parts that will be essential.
Induction Stove?
The electric version of the Steam Blast Furnace, nothing more, nothing less. But it does add more recipes that can only be done with this furnace.
&bI want a car now!
Oh dear me, this was such a headache, but now we're going even further beyond? I hope I don't get a headache..
Will turn various fluids into their lighter parts. So this is how we get distilled water?
&bIs it a Jet Engine or a Diesel Engine?
These tools will be powerful and potentially replace your pickaxe and shovel. The jetpack will also fly faster with better fuel, handle with care.
&9I want a console now!
A Digital World! Finally, we're at this stage, where things get even more ridiculously complex. Remember to read carefully.
Time to be rich!
A huge multiblock that can dig for Crude Oil under the bedrock using fluid pipes. I hope we can sell all this oil for money... wait, do we have money at all?
Can make items and fluids react with each other.

This is a very advanced machinery that is fairly tall with how they're able to assemble to an even taller machinery. If you would like to change the height, right click it with a screwdriver and it applies to other multiblocks with multiple shapes like the Kanthal tier Electric Blast Furnace!
You can use a Heat Exchanger to recover the HP water for another cycle.
More upgrades!

Turbo Upgrades will be useful to speed up your machinery when right clicked with it while the Advanced Machine Hulls will be used on machines to accept MV only as they're a higher tier. Both can be removed using a crowbar when necessary.
Splits items by spinning them very fast.
The electric equivalent of the Steam Quarry.
Provide it with items and energy, and watch your resources GO BRRR!
Its structure is exactly the same as the Steam Quarry's.
&6Gold Drill
One of the Quarry's drills.
&3Stainless Steel Drill
One of the Quarry's drills.
&8Steel Drill
One of the Quarry's drills.
Upgrades!
You are almost there! With oil processing, you're a few steps closer to making even more advanced machinery.
I wonder if this steam turbine can blow us away? Nah.
Another option for small setups is to use an HV steam turbine, they are not a joke with their production.
I hope it's safe to put ice cream in here.
The Vacuum Freezer is what it sounds like, it cools down or freezes solids and liquids in order to make them usable.
Can split materials into their different parts using strong electric currents.
Squeaky Clean
Stainless Steel, another necessary ingot used for new stuff. Wait.. I see a stain here!
Smelting stainless steel dust in an EBF will give you hot ingots, which you can cool back into regular ingots with a Vacuum Freezer.
Kanthal Coils are used by the Electric Blast Furnace to produce more materials as they are powerful enough to do so.
Titanium
This is not an easy metal to work with, remember that you need machinery to even bend this, but it shows its durability.
Any #c:titanium_ingots
Computer Brain
A Processing Unit is used to create highly sophisticated machine parts and even highly advanced drills that are already difficult to make use of.
Raw Iridium
Raw Iridium
Can we make a shield out of this?
This blastproof alloy plate is going to be specially important with a specific process that will be booming.
Stop giving me peer pressure!
A new multiblock made of titanium that can turn water into HP (high pressure) water, steam into HP steam, and the other way around.
Iron Man
A specialized chestplate that is used to grant the wearer fall damage protection and creative flight, but will not protect the wearer from any external damage. It must be powered in order to use.
An Implosion Compressor is an interesting machinery that contains explosions inside it. Using Industrial TNT, it is able to compress the most resistant materials.
&dThe Endgame
Using this very delicate material, it will be used to create the best of the best machinery for UNLIMITED POWER!!
The most powerful machine upgrade ever. Have a look for yourself, maybe you can create a Replicator?
The Fusion Reactor is the ultimate energy source, to make it work requires a large amount of energy and it can combine Deuterium, Tritium, and/ or Helium-3 into Helium Plasma.
Do not underestimate SCIENCE! Without it, we wouldn't have been able to create the best energy producer of the mod!
A large multiblock whose purpose is to generate massive amounts of energy by consuming nuclear fuel.
It can produce 100s of times more EU/t than diesel. It comes in several sizes from small to large.

How it works under the hood can be a bit overwhelming, nevertheless, you don't need to understand the details to be able to design a powerful reactor. We recommend that you experiment with various designs in creative mode until you find one that suits you.

Note that the Nuclear Reactor cannot explode, emit radiation, or otherwise damage the map. The only thing that it can damage is the items you put in it if the temperature gets too high (more on this later). You should feel free to experiment, and enjoy your new life as a nuclear scientist!
The main component is the Nuclear Casing which is made with Nuclear Alloy : a mix of cadmium, beryllium and blastproof alloy.
The upper part of the structure accepts Nuclear Item or Fluid Hatches (or simple casings). Those are the inputs and outputs of the reactor.
Each hatch has one input (either item or fluid) and two outputs. The input slots will form a grid, displayed in the reactor GUI (accessible by right-clicking on the controller).

Each hatch has a temperature and stores heat which can be dissipated in several ways. The heat will naturally move to an adjacent hatch or to the outside if the hatch is on the edge (the heat is then lost). The speed of this process is equal to the hatches content's heat transfer coefficient (shown in REI) times the temperature difference. The heat can also be extracted in a fluid hatch by producing steam. A temperature above an item's maximum temperature will destroy it.

The core nuclear reactor elements are neutrons. Those are produced by the nuclear fuel. There are two type of neutrons, fast and thermal : the fast carry energy while the thermal do not. Neutrons move in a straight line until they encounter an element or exit the reactor (for fast neutrons, their energy is then lost). The flow of neutrons is shown in the reactor GUI.

When a neutron encounters a non-empty hatch, two things can happen : the neutron is absorbed or scattered. A scattered neutron will randomly change direction. If the scattered neutron is fast, it has a chance of slowing down, becoming a thermal one. This transfers the energy from the neutron to the hatch in the form of heat. An absorbed neutron stops its course and also transfers its energy if it was a fast neutron.

The number of absorbed neutrons in a single hatch can be seen in the GUI. The probability for each processes is shown in REI. Those will strongly depend on the hatch's content and the neutron type (fast or thermal). Nuclear fuels absorb thermal neutrons far better.

When a neutron, either fast or thermal, is absorbed in nuclear fuel, more neutrons are generated. Those are always fast neutrons and have random direction. Their generation is accompanied by the direct release of energy in the form of additional heat in the hatch.

Above a certain threshold, the number of generated neutrons will decrease with the temperature until reaching zero. This process wastes some energy, but guarantees the stability of the reactor. The number of generated neutrons (and effective efficiency), the direct energy and the temperature threshold are in REI.

Each nuclear component has maximum number of absorptions. When reached, the item is either destroyed or transformed into a depleted version. This is particularly useful for nuclear fuel because some part of the U238 is transformed into Plutonium in the depleted version, meaning some of it can be transformed back into fuel.

The same thing happens for fluids: a bit of fluid is transformed after each neutron absorption. This can be used to mass produce useful isotopes like deuterium and tritium. In both cases, the outcome is shown in REI.
TACTICAL NUKE! INCOMING!!
Nah, it doesn't explode and do external damage, but it only works inside machinery, sorry to burst your bubble.
Are we gonna fix history for Humanity?
I wonder if creating a miniature black hole is safe? Ah well, it'll be useful for quantum physics.
UwU Matter
This is a difficult bucket to use. With an electrolyzer and a singularity, large amounts of energy will be turned into Hawnking Radiation, into UU Matter, the very fabric of the universe!!
&bAluminum Drill
A specialized drill used to dig for crude oil and only useful in an Oil Drilling Rig.
One of the most expensive drills to create, but it is useful for digging up iridium and uranium ores.
Engineer's Toy
Is it a monkey or a wrench? Anyway this will be useful in rotating the machine or changing their input and output locations.
Don't break it with the wrench, use a pickaxe.
Where's the Plug?
This machine part will be needed in order for more advanced electric machinery to function so remember to make some of these.
Advance, advance, advance!
Getting these steel hatches will be essential for your quarry to use up their drills and give out their results.
Pack your bags, people!
The Steel Packer is a self-explanatory machinery that automates combining of certain machinery parts, the sibling of Steel Unpacker.
You can now automate double ingots and pipes, for example! Again, check REI.
Unpack your bags, people!
The Steel Unpacker is a self-explanatory machinery that takes apart machine parts into other smaller pieces as a sort of recycling system, and the sibling of the Steel Packer.
Energy Transfer
Cable networks have limitations on the amount of energy they will pull into the network depending on tier.
My back is killing me! More boilers?! I might get a heatstroke at this rate!
ftbquests.chapter.powah.title: &5Powah!
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests0.title: Electrician's First Job
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests0.subtitle: Welcome to Powah! A generator mod used to power machinery of almost every tech available. Learning how to use them will give you the power to function your machinery without the need to use fuel.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests0.descript: The book will help you understand the mod if needed.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests1.title: Electric Glue
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests1.subtitle: Dielectric Paste is an ingredient used to glue and craft electric parts used in the machinery, you should prepare a lot if you plan on upgrading.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests2.title: Initial Parts
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests2.subtitle: Dielectric Rods are one of the main building parts in creating another piece of machinery part.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests3.title: Electrician's Right Hand
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests3.subtitle: The Wrench is a tool used to rotate powah machinery, config with energy cables and even link certain electric rods to energizing orbs.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests4.subtitle: By itself, it's not useful, but after using it on a Zombie or a Husk, it will upgrade into the Player Aerial Pearl.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests5.title: Secondary Parts
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests5.subtitle: Capacitors are the next parts that are used to create a variety of electric machinery, you can either combine two capacitors to get a large one or cut one to get two tiny capacitors.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests6.subtitle: Thermo Plates are an essential part used to create and upgrade your generators.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests7.title: Heart of the Machine
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests7.subtitle: Dielectric Casing is a material that is required on all machinery to function as they always contain one in each recipe and upgrade.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests8.subtitle: An exclusive ingredient used to create Player Transmitters.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests9.title: Walking Battery
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests9.subtitle: A Player Transmitter will charge items in the player's inventory or equipped armor/trinkets.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests11.subtitl: A Binding Card is used to connect a Player Transmitter to a machinery that can wirelessly connect to each other and charge. Only works in the same dimension.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests12.title: Bounded Through Dimensions
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests12.subtitl: This Binding Card will allow wireless charging across dimensions, but must use a binding card on an Enderman to work.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests19.subtitl: Energizing Rods are a type of machinery that energizes items contained in an energizing orb and transforms them.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests20.subtitl: As the name implies, Energizing Orb receives electric charge and uses it on items to upgrade machinery. The higher tier the material, the more power required to energize.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests32.subtitl: 2nd Tier Capacitors used to upgrade to Hardened Machinery.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests33.subtitl: 3rd Tier Capacitors used to upgrade to Blazing Machinery.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests34.subtitl: 4th Tier Capacitors used to upgrade to Niotic Machinery.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests35.subtitl: 5th Tier Capacitors used to upgrade to Spirited Machinery.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests36.subtitl: The 6th Tier Capacitor used to upgrade to Nitro Machinery, the final tier.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests37.subtitl: Thermo Generators use heat sources under them to generate power and use water to cool down. The higher tier, the more power generated from heat.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests44.subtitl: Furnators use burning fuel sources such as coal and wood to generate power. The higher tier, the more power and efficiency created from fuel sources.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests45.subtitl: Energy Hoppers are used to charge items in a chest without the need to use an energizing orb.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests46.subtitl: Uraninite is used to create Reactors that also use uraninite to generate electricity. You need 36 blocks to create a functioning Reactor, the higher tier, the more power generated from Uraninite.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests48.subtitl: Ender Cores are a primary material used to create ender-based machinery.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests49.subtitl: Ender Cells are energy transferring machinery that is wireless and will transfer power through another Ender Cell using the same channel number. Each Ender Cell must contain an Energy Cell in order to function and store power.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests63.subtitl: Magmators use lava to generator power. The higher the tier, the more power and efficiency used from lava.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests64.subtitl: Dry ice is used to cool down Reactors, another alternative to using water as coolant.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests65.subtitl: Energy Dischargers drain energy away from charged machinery and store it in an internal storage pocket and can redirect the power into another piece of machinery using cables.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests66.subtitl: Photoelectric Panes are used to create Solar Panels.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests67.subtitl: A Lens of Ender allows a Solar Panel to see through blocks which allows it to absorb sunlight while under a block.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests67.descrip: Use a Photoelectric Pane on an Enderman or Endermite.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests68.subtitl: Solar Panels generate energy during the day time, the higher tier, the more power generated during the day.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests69.subtitl: Charged Snowballs carry enough energy to cause a lightning strike when hitting a mob or hitting the ground.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests70.subtitl: Portable energy storage that can be used to charge machinery when needed.
ftbquests.chapter.powah.quests89.subtitl: Energy Cells are basically a bulk battery that can contain and transfer energy to other machinery connected to it when a machine is taking time to produce energy.
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.title: &eReforging
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.quests0.desc: &7When crafting or obtaining tools, armors or weapons, you will notice that they have a quality.
&6Reforging&7 is an essential part of your own progression because it allows to change the rarity your item has.
&7To do so, you can find the &eReforging&7 tab in an &eAnvil&7. You will require:

&7The base material is related directly to the item you want to reforge. For example, a &eHoly Wand&7 would require a &eGold Ingot&7 as a base material. You can see the required materials by hovering over the reforge button after placing your item in the middle slot.
&7The Base Item is the item you want to change the rarity. Not all items are reforgable, only tools, weapons and armors are.
&7This material will decide what quality your item will be reforged to, there are 3 tiers of materials which you can see in the next quests of this questline.
&7It's not all about grinding! You can &eincrease chances on higher qualities&7 with your &aLuck&7! Items that give luck passively, luck potions, trinkets, wine, get them all!
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.quests1.desc: &7The &nLimestone Chunk&r&7 is the first tier of reforging materials.
&7It is found in the &aOverworld&7, obtainable by &eStonecutting&7 a &fLimestone Block&r&8 (for 4 pieces)&7, or an &fDiorite Block&r &8(for 1 piece)
&7It can reforge to the following qualities:
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.quests2.desc: &7The &nPyrite Chunk&r&7 is the second tier of reforging materials.
&7It is found in the &cNether&7, obtainable by &eCrafting&7 using 4 &6Pyrite Dust&r&8 (for 1 piece)&7, or by &eSmelting&7 an &6Ancient Debris&r&7 block &8(for 4 pieces)
&8* Pyrite Dust can be obtained by mining Pyrite Ore in the Nether
&7It can reforge to the following qualities:
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.quests3.desc: &7The &nGalena Chunk&r&7 is the third tier and last reforging material.
&7It is found in the &dEnd&7, obtainable by &eCrafting&7 using 2 &3Galena Dust&r&7 and 2 &3Popped Chorus Fruit&r&8 (for 1 piece)&7.
&7Alternatively, instead of using Galena Dust, you can use &3End Stone&r.
&8* Galena Dust can be found in the deep caves of the Overworld.
&7It can reforge to the following qualities:
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.quests4.desc: &eOne hundred Mythic items... You truly have became the master of reforging.
ftbquests.chapter.reforging.quests5.desc: &8You've became a very renowned blacksmith. What are you going to do with this knowledge?
ftbquests.chapter.simply_swords.title: &dUnique Weaponry
&6&lSimply Swords&r offers over &a&l15&r weapons types for the player to utilize.
It also has the unique featureset of &b&n&lRunic Powers&r, which can be given to weapons via &n&bsockets&r!
&c&lEmpowered Remnants&r are created by melting down unique weapons.
They are used in the creation of &9&lRunefused Gems&r, and &6&lNetherfused Gems&r.
To make it, combine a &bRunic Tablet&r with a &cEmpowered Remnant&r in a Smithing Table.
Click to identify which power you have rolled.
In order to make it, combine a &cEmpowered Remnant&r with a &6Netherite Ingot&r in a Smithing Table.
Click to identify which power you have rolled.
This will be the first step in &bdiscovering sockets&r and &9runic powers&r!
Collect the Rest of the Uniques!
Sharp and Cold to the Touch!
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.title: &9Tech Reborn
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests0.su: Welcome to Tech Reborn! A tech mod that provides options for power power generation, power storage, bulk item storage, tools and the creation of materials from energy and scrap.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests1.su: Time to get tapping, here is a sapling to help you get started. \n\n By right-clicking the tree tap on the orange spots of a rubber tree you are able to extract sap that can be smelted into rubber.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests2.su: With its enhanced properties, refined iron serves as the foundation for constructing advanced devices and intricate circuits.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests3.su: These are the basic building blocks of early-game Tech Reborn.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests4.su: An upgraded version of a furnace that allows it to run off of energy instead of coal.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests5.su: Using two iron furnaces and some refined iron you are able to fashion a primitive alloy smelter allowing for some new materials to be created.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests6.su: An upgraded version of the Iron Alloy Smelter that allows it to run off of energy instead of coal.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests8.su: With its relentless force and precision, this mechanical masterpiece takes raw materials and subjects them to immense pressure. \n\nThis machine will be very handy on your journey through Tech Reborn.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests9.su: A machine that allows for more efficient use of raw resources, particularly useful for all that rubber you'll need.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests10.s: The recycler is the ultimate machine for getting rid of unwanted items, it accepts any item and simply turns it into scrap by using energy.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests11.s: A basic machine that converts ingots into wire, making for more efficient use of the material.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests12.s: This offers a significant upgrade over the traditional furnace, providing the ability for easy automation and more fuel-efficient smelting capabilities.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests12.d: Allows you to smelt 12.5 items per piece of coal
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests15.s: Congratulations, this is where the midgame of Tech reborn begins.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests16.s: By harnessing the power of centrifugal forces the Industrial Centrifuge allows for the extraction of several new resources.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests20.s: Aluminum is a component in a lot of things around you. However the most readily available should be clay and bauxite.\n\n To get aluminum it's recommended to electrolyze &dClay dust&r / &dBauxite dust&r or industrially grind &dBauxite ore&r
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests21.s: Iron reinforced with nickel, creating an alloy stronger than the sum of its parts. \n\nCan be used for higher yield crafts of mixed metal ingots or as plates to make some medium tier generators.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests22.s: A simple, elegant mix of gold and silver.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests23.s: A rather useful alloy, mostly for creating mixed alloy ingots.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests24.s: Made in the Industrial Blast Furnace.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests25.s: Unlock the true potential of your machines with the Overclocker Upgrade a remarkable innovation that cuts waiting times by 25%% per upgrade.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests26.s: Remnants of a bygone era, transformers are a thing of the past.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests27.s: A rather humble upgrade that increases the amount of energy your machines can store. Helpful for when having an external energy buffer isn't feasible.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests28.s: Sick and tired of that whining sound your machines make while working? I have just the thing for you, plop a muffler upgrade in your machine and i assure you... \n\n "It's quieter than a mime trapped in a library during a power outage."
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests29.s: Well, it worked. But now it wont cool down. We're gonna need a machine for that.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests30.s: Steel and Tungsten are usually not alloyable but perhaps an Industrial Blast Furnace can get hot enough?
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests31.s: Seems like vacuum freezing it works, now to turn it into something more usable.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests32.s: The simplest form of energy production, consumes any burnable item and turns it into energy.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests34.s: Provides energy from the sun, generates between 0 e/t and 3 e/t depending on the time of day.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests35.s: Provides energy from the sun, generates between 4 e/t and 24 e/t depending on the time of day.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests36.s: Provides energy from the sun, generates between 0 e/t and 12 e/t depending on the time of day.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests37.s: Provides energy from the sun, generates between 8 e/t and 48 e/t depending on the time of day.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests38.s: Provides energy from the sun, generates between 32 e/t and 512 e/t depending on the time of day.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests39.s: Generates 20 E/t by consuming either diesel or nitro diesel.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests41.s: Generates 0.1 E/t per side touching water.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests42.s: Generates 2 E/t (2.5 E/t during thunderstorms), needs to be placed above y: 64.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests44.s: For the late-game you are going to need a lot of tungsten. One way of obtaining it is by centrifuging lava or endstone dust.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests46.s: "This machine does it for you!", got too many Scrapboxes for two hands? Well you're in luck, craft it now! The Scrapbox-inator opens any Scrapbox at the low-low cost of 32 E/t.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests47.t: Who said recycling couldn't be fun?
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests47.s: By taking 9 of your newly found scraps you are able to create a scrap box that essentially is a loot box containing random goodies. Finally a good use for all that spare cobble you got laying around.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests48.s: Ah, the chemical reactor. It facilitates the combining of a myriad of chemicals, allows for the conversion of rotten flesh into leather and importantly the crafting of &4Synthetic Redstone Crystal&r.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests49.s: Due to the sturdiness of iridium alloy your compressor wont be enough to make plates out of it. Maybe explosions are a must? Controlled ones of course.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests50.s: If you're running low on resources, now might be the time to get an assembling machine as it allows for some alternate crafts for circuits that cut down on costs. \n\nOne specific recipe that might of interest is the &dElytra&r but how are you going to get those End Rods?
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests52.s: Absolutely necessary for making cupronickel rings and nichrome heating coils
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests53.s: Generates 16 E/t using Methane or Hydrogen.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests56.s: This malleable substance allows you to craft a multitude of materials, to think it was only created using scrap and energy.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests57.s: A chip optimized for energy flow, allowing you to create machines with higher power consumption.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests58.s: An improved energy crystal, allowing for even higher levels of energy storage.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests59.s: Holds significantly more power than your average battery.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests60.s: UNLIMITED POWER! Or well, at least close enough. \n\nUsing a fusion reactor you can create 16ke/t or maybe make some more of that, hard to get, iridium.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests61.s: The highest tier of circuit, a lot of these are needed for lapotron crystals. They're also useful for making the chips cheaper in the assembling machine.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests63.s: By centrifuging lapis you are able to extract lazurite.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests64.s: Made in the Industrial Blast Furnace.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests65.s: An incredibly powerful alloy, only used for the most powerful items.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests66.s: You can obtain platinum dust by using the Industrial grinder to either grind &dIridium ore&r, &dSheldonite ore&r or \n&dHearts of the Sea&r
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests67.s: As simple as compressing an ingot.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests68.s: As simple as compressing an ingot.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests69.s: These crystals very suitable for energy storage, but not by themselves, perhaps with some silicon?
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests70.s: A plate of silicon serves as a good base for a lot of electronics.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests73.s: Made in the Industrial Blast Furnace.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests74.s: Allows for the creation of fluids using uu-matter and energy.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests75.s: Made in the Industrial Blast Furnace.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests76.s: Obtained from either electrolyzing &4Bauxite dust&r or industrially grinding &dHearts of the Sea&r.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests77.s: By electrolyzing crushed flint you were able to extract the silicon from it, perhaps this could be used to enhance your power storage capabilities? \n\n To obtain silicon cells you electrolyze either 8 &dflint dust&r or 16 &dsand&r
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests78.s: Obtained through Electrolyzing emerald dust or Ender Peal dust
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests80.s: Made in the Industrial Blast Furnace.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests82.s: Can be found in the overworld between y: -64 and y: 0
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests83.s: Since the Iridium ore is so rare you might want to centrifuge some \n&dPlatinum dust&r
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests84.s: Finally you have a reliable way of getting nickel. \n\nYou can get it by centrifuging raw gold ore, raw iron ore or raw copper ore.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests85.s: By using Mercury instead of water in your industrial grinder you can significantly increase its yield. \n\nObtained by centrifuging either redstone dust or cinnabar dust
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests87.s: By combining a treetrap with a drain you allow yourself to fully automate the collection of sap by simply placing it next to a rubber tree, letting it collect the sap as it appears. It will even deposit its items into an inventory below it.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests88.s: After breaking your machines with your fist for the 13th time, you realize there has to be a better way. \n\nThe wrench allows you to instantly break machines by shift+rightclicking and also allows for rotation by simply right-clicking
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests89.s: With a drain you can pull any liquid above it into it, a simple use case for this could be creating infinite water.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests91.s: Generates 256 kE/bolt of lightning. Place iron fences on top of it, attaching more than one will increase the chance that lightning hits the rod.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests92.s: Generates 4 E/t as long as it has a dragon egg on top of it.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests93.s:
["","The configuration system for machines can feel daunting for some. But here's a brief primer on it for anyone that needs it.","
","
","To open the configuration system you click the wrench on the lefts side of the UI in any Tech Reborn machine that supports it. Then you press the slot you want to configure, this opens up a pop-up that shows how it's currently configured for that side, and then you press the side you want to configure to cycle through input, output and disabled. You can also check the box for the auto-input or auto-output to make the machine push/pull from the inventory adjacent to the configured sides.","
","
","If you need something in video format ",{"text":"Click Here ","color":"light_purple","clickEvent":{"action":"open_url","value":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZPFeYfYnbZ8"}},"to see a short video from the mod-creator on the system."]
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests94.s: In older versions of the mod (minecraft v1.12) machines used to blow up and cables would break if you used a power tier too high for them. This is no longer the case although you will still see the transformers in rei, they are not needed.\n\n TLDR Transformers are only useful for restricting energy flow.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests95.s: &4[CAUTION]&r At the Highest setting this WILL launch you about 250 blocks into the air
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests96.s: By centrifuging 8 marble dust you can get yourself a small amount of magnesium dust.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests98.s: A slight upgrade over a Red Cell Battery
ftbquests.chapter.tech_reborn.quests99.s: A battery that lets you change its energy output rate.
"An enderchest for energy" - All Interdimensional SUs you place down share the same energy storage. \n\nMeaning you can now transport your power anywhere without those pesky wires.
A sizable upgrade to a battery box, allowing for 100x more power storage.
By integrating lapotron crystals with your MFE you can store 10x more power in the same space.
If you're tired of charging your items one-by-one I have just the thing for you, the chare-o-mat allows for the charging of 6 items at once.
Obtained by centrifuging \n&dGlowstone dust&r or &dEndstone dust&r
By centrifuging 16 cells of helium you can get helium^3 which can be used in the fusion reactor for power generation.
By canning helium cells we get helium coolant cells which can be useful for crafting superconductors and speed upgrades.
Useful for canning all the things.
This little thing can chare all the items in your inventory
Your most basic form of power storage.\n\nKeep in mind that the dot is the output and everything else is input for all power storage blocks in this Tech Reborn.
An upgraded version of the Basic Drill.
An upgraded version of the Basic Chainsaw.
An upgraded version of the Basic Jackhammer.\n\nShift + Right-Click to swap modes.
An electric tool to replace your basic pickaxes.
An electric tool to replace your basic axes.
A tool made specifically to mine through stone-like blocks. \n\nMeaning it doesn't mine ores. Good for making tunnels or clearing spaces.
"Jack of all trades, master of none." \n\nThis tool functions as a pickaxe, axe, shovel and sword.
After gong through one too many treetaps it might be time to make an electric tool to replace them.
A tool for harvesting ores and the like while keeping their shape intact.
An upgrade to the Advanced Drill, allowing it to mine in a 3x3 area when activated.
An upgrade to the Advanced Chainsaw, allowing it to fell entire trees in one swing.
An upgrade to the Advanced Jackhammer, allowing for an even bigger mining area.
Getting Deuterium is a three step process.

1. Electrolyze 5 Water Cells 
2. Centrifuge 5 Water Cells to get 4 Hydrogen Cells 
3. Centrifuge 4 Hydrogen Cells to get 1 Deuterium Cell
Tritium is obtained by simply centrifuging 4 Deuterium Cells
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.title: &6The Bumblezone
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests0: Welcome, curious adventurer! I suppose I should ask you how you got in here, but no matter, the world of the bees is what you see before you, explore the world and see what Bee culture can you learn.
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests1: What's with the air in this place? It will definitely be not good for those who have allergies, this place is full of pollen!
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests2: Okay, while there's no actual jam that bees made, but at least there are music discs to listen to.
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests3: How did the bees come up with the weapons? Their own stingers? Their own honey?
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests4: I wonder why is there a compass made of honey? Maybe it leads somewhere important in this large hive... Why's it sticking to my hand?
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests5: A maze? This looks very unsafe, I probably shouldn't go in here without any safety first.
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests1: Many bee warriors have fallen and this shrine is to dedicate the fallen warriors, with a stinger spear of one of the most prominent bee warriors to have ever lived.
Bees having a subway seems out of place considering how modern this technology is, but at least travel is fun.
Meet up with Her Majesty, the Queen Bee. She is willing to be impartial and trade with you items and maybe even send you some tasks worth doing.
One of Us! One of Us!
Congratulations. You have now earn the favor of the Queen Bee! Now you are one of her kin and the bees will no longer attack you, but perhaps there is more to explore.
What a majestic set of armor worn by the bee warriors. While not very powerful, it is a very nice looking armor.
A stream of pollination? I'm unsure of the purpose of such a place, but there is plenty of pollen and sugar water to use.
I suppose this is a bee's way of living in luxury, a hotel, based around honey! I wonder how much it costs to spend a night inside.
Very curious, there's a villager in the hive raising honey slimes? I wonder how they ended up in here. Maybe they made friends with the bees.
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests2: This is getting ridiculous, how are there pirate bees? What are they trying to steal anyway?
Such a massive flower in the hive! It might be normal or small size in the overworld, but I wonder how it'd got so massive.
I wonder if this is how bees were first discovered, and brought to the present, frozen in ice like humans.
Why do bees need a parkour course if they can fly? Well, at least we can try to make it to the top and find something.
The Queen Bee must've cared for such gardens as there is a special flower that grants enchanting powers.
&c(!) You need to be Level 65 to use!

&7The Crystalline flower can be placed on top of Glistering Honey Crystals. With it, you can offer items to make the flower grow. With this growth, you can choose specific enchantments to put inside a book.
Who knew bees can have a house inside of a hive? Well, a little odd that the house is shaped like an actual bee. I hope we're not intruding their space.
Based on the appearance, it seems that bees would fly around these hoops in the past, but now they're just an ancient relic of the past in this hive.
So this is how they make music, they also dance too.
A very small hive temple, must've been another place of worship for the bees.
So there's a fountain for honey. I suppose that's another way to show the bees' love for honey.
ftbquests.chapter.the_bumblezone.quests3: Are the bees training themselves to be able to use projectile weapons? They sure are smart.
There's too much honey! How do the bees keep producing more without getting tired? Maybe we should call it Government Honey in the future.
A battle cube seems to be some sort of spider dungeon covered in massive webs, maybe this will be helpful among your tasks later.
Mm.. an ancient shrine? I wonder if this is how the bees worship their Queen..
How is there a large cherry tree in this hive? I'm very curious how this size is scaled in the outside world.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.title: &cThe Nether
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests1.sub: Spawns next to &6Blaze Spawners &7in &4nether fortresses &7but can also appear in &4Nether Wastes.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests3.sub: &8The Stone Golem &rcan only be summoned with a &6Golem Ritual&r  while being in &4The Nether &f(use the for more informations)
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests4.sub: Spawns in Crimson Forests in &4The Nether&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests5.sub: Spawns in &4The Remnants of The Decaying Kingdom&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests5.des: The Decaying King spawns in the remnants of the Decaying Kingdom in the nether. This cursed monstrosity wields The Darkin Blade, and has many deadly attacks to look out for. Killing it makes it drop the Darkin Blade, a Lord Soul and the Withered Demon Heart.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests6.sub: The Soul Reaper spawns in the &bsoul sand valley&r with its mount, The Nightmare.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_end.title: &dThe End
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_end.quests0.sub: &eEnter The End Portal using twelve of the unique eyes.
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_end.quests14.de: &eOnce the trade is unlocked, it will not have stock until a day passes.
